class.name: Tabs
class.description: Simple tabs control, similar to [TabContainer] but is only in charge of drawing tabs, not interacting with children.

method.name: ensure_tab_visible
method.description: Moves the scroll view to make the tab visible.

method.name: get_offset_buttons_visible
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the offset buttons (the ones that appear when there's not enough space for all tabs) are visible.

method.name: get_previous_tab
method.description: Returns the previously active tab index.

method.name: get_select_with_rmb
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if select with right mouse button is enabled.

method.name: get_tab_disabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code] is disabled.

method.name: get_tab_icon
method.description: Returns the [Texture] for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code] or [code]null[/code] if the tab has no [Texture].

method.name: get_tab_offset
method.description: Returns the number of hidden tabs offsetted to the left.

method.name: get_tab_rect
method.description: Returns tab [Rect2] with local position and size.

method.name: get_tab_title
method.description: Returns the title of the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: set_select_with_rmb
method.description: If [code]true[/code], enables selecting a tab with the right mouse button.

method.name: set_tab_disabled
method.description: If [code]disabled[/code] is [code]true[/code], disables the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code], making it non-interactable.

method.name: set_tab_icon
method.description: Sets an [code]icon[/code] for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: set_tab_title
method.description: Sets a [code]title[/code] for the tab at index [code]tab_idx[/code].

method.name: set_tabs_rearrange_group
method.description: Defines the rearrange group ID. Choose for each [Tabs] the same value to dragging tabs between [Tabs]. Enable drag with [member drag_to_rearrange_enabled].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], tabs can be rearranged with mouse drag.
if [code]true[/code], the mouse's scroll wheel can be used to navigate the scroll view.
The alignment of all tabs. See [enum TabAlign] for details.
Sets when the close button will appear on the tabs. See [enum CloseButtonDisplayPolicy] for details.

signal.name: reposition_active_tab_request
signal.description: Emitted when the active tab is rearranged via mouse drag. See [member drag_to_rearrange_enabled].

signal.name: right_button_pressed
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is right-clicked.

signal.name: tab_changed
signal.description: Emitted when switching to another tab.

signal.name: tab_clicked
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is clicked, even if it is the current tab.

signal.name: tab_close
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is closed.

signal.name: tab_hover
signal.description: Emitted when a tab is hovered by the mouse.
